Internet coverage does not necessarily translate into internet use. 40% of global population live within range of a mobile signal but still fail to make use of it (aka â€œusage gapâ€) and this gap has persisted even as coverage has risen: https://t.co/tnGFxcoGT4 #Africa #Tanzania https://t.co/C4ZcXJWBgA

como otras voces, me hubiera gustado que la 1era vez q se presenten estos datos al pÃºblico hubiera sido con mensajes fuertes, en una conferencia de prensa grande y con datos abiertos.
Nada es perfecto, pero mejor comunicaciÃ³n promueve la confianza.

Great thread on how opening up govt. data has huge upsides.
But no govt. does it becoz it's politically disruptive.
IMO, better to first develop an open-data culture, by focusing on politically non-sensititive data. Once these show results, it'll be easier to demand more. https://t.co/47qdBbgEe6
